events.name: Android 3City meetup
events.description:
Hi, Android devs!

I would like to invite all of you, interested in technology, enthusiasts, professionals, and beginners.
Let's create history together. Sign up for the first (of many) GDG 3City Android meeting. We plan to run 3 talks, each around 20 minutes. There will be a fridge full of excellent beverages and a lot of pizzas.

Schedule:
17.30 - registration and pizzas
18.00 - the start of the first presentation
19.00 - time for networking

## The talks
- Jetpack Compose by Marcin Kitowicz (http://tiny.cc/marcink)
* Jetpack Compose, the future of building UI on Android. Discover a new approach in the declarative way of building UI on the Android platform.

- Developer on stage, or how to create a thrilling technical presentation by Natalja Nazaruk(http://tiny.cc/natalian)
* Public speaking is a difficult art. Especially for developers who stereotypically feel much better at their desks staring at the IDEs, than being in the spotlight. Sometimes, however, we would like to share an interesting topic, present a way to solve a problem or build our personal brand as a specialist in the field. This presentation intends to help you make your first steps as a public speaker.

- Why Paging Loves Room by Piotr Prus(http://tiny.cc/piotrp)
* Real-life use case including paging, Firestore, and Room.
The talk will cover the usage of the Android Paging library for querying data from firestore database. I will present the problem that we encountered in the project, how to manage local changes of data and how Room library saves us.

###
Join our Discord channel: https://discord.gg/ChQ6bX
###

The event will be co-hosted by Schibsted Tech Polska.
events.how_to_find_us: Guest cards will be available at the reception, ground floor of the building.

events.name: [ONLINE] Android 3City meetup
events.description:
Hi, Android devs!

I would like to invite all of you, interested in technology, enthusiasts, professionals, and beginners.
In light of the coronavirus [COVID-19] situation, we decided to bring the next event online.
The plans for this event does not change in principle but is expanding. We will run 2 talks, in english, each around 20 minutes. After live public streaming, the video will be available on the GDG3City youtube channel.

Schibsted Tech Polska is a partner of this event. Check their website: https://www.schibsted.pl/

Sign up for the second GDG 3City Android meeting.
https://youtu.be/Eq1OlX6QK1U

## The talks

- Swipe out in the RecyclerView by Piotr Prus (https://www.linkedin.com/in/piotrprus/)
* This talk is about using MotionLayout in RecyclerView item to create beautiful and smooth swipe gestures and great user experience.

- Floating Action Button with Speed Dial by Dawid Lewsza
(https://www.linkedin.com/in/dawid-lewsza/)
* This talk is all about expanding the floating action button. Discuss possible approaches, show interesting animations and a few SVGs.

###
Join our Discord channel: https://discord.gg/PfT2dGM
###

The event co-hosted by Nordea is postponed.

upcoming.name: [ONLINE] GDG 3City meetup - Flutter edition
upcoming.description:
Hi, Community!

I would like to invite all of you, interested in technology, enthusiasts, professionals, and beginners for the GDG meetup, flutter edition!

This time we will run 3 talks, in English, each around 20 minutes. After live public streaming, the video will be available on the GDG3City youtube channel.

Schibsted Tech Polska is a partner of this event. Check their website: https://www.schibsted.pl/

Link to stream and chat will be provided soon.

## The talks

Topic: Async way of Flutter
Abstract: Asynchronous programming with standard building blocks of Dart and Flutter.
About the speaker: Kamil Rykowski. Flutter developer & enthusiast of cross-platform techs. Indie game dev working on mobile post-apo RPG @Vaultomb. Allergic to over-engineering & non-productive code refactoring.
Profile: https://twitter.com/KamilRykowski

Topic: Github actions + Firebase App Distribution with Flutter apps.
Abstract: Find out how fast and simple you can set up your App distribution process to automatically release your new App versions to testers and users.
About the Speaker: Marcin Kitowicz. Android Developer at Schibsted Tech Polska. Passionate about learning new technologies. Never bored. Recently his mind has been completely absorbed by Flutter.
Profile: https://github.com/kitek

Topic: Having fun with painting in Flutter (albo Painting with Flutter)
Abstract: Sometimes widgets are not enough and we need to create some custom experience that seems impossible to be achieved with Containers or Stacks. This is when CustomPainter can shine. Let's learn how to draw basic shapes, lines, and complex paths. How to apply shaders, filters, and draw text paragraphs. And finally how to take it to the next level with animations.
About the Speaker: Dominik Roszkowski. Mobile developer experienced in Flutter and other cross-platform technologies. He's been a deputy manager of the PW-Sat2 Polish student satellite that was launched into orbit in 2018. Co-founder of Flutter Warsaw meetup and Flutter Europe conference.
Profile: https://twitter.com/OrestesGaolin

###
Join our Discord channel: https://discord.gg/ZU6uUcD
###
